title: MS in Nanomedicine — Boston - Graduate Programs
description: Master of Science in Nanomedicine is a degree for scientists, engineers, and clinicians passionate about nanomedicine-related careers.
cleaned_text: in Nanomedicine is a one-of-a-kind, industry-aligned degree for the next generation of scientists, engineers, and clinicians passionate about nanomedicine-related careers. The program prepares students to tackle challenges and opportunities in healthcare through hands-on training in nanomedicine research, innovation, and commercialization, along with a full-time co-op experience. Boston Location Full-Time Part-Time Part-Time Commitment 2-2.5 Years Duration of Program Fall, Spring Entry Terms Yes * Meets F1 Visa Requirements
